content: add a bit of love and cute decoration to your home by adding a crochet heart coaster to your desk or coffee table my crochet heart coaster pattern is made in row making it easy to make without the pesky magic_ring **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn ▢tapestry needle ▢5mm hook **abbreviations us terms ** single_crochet = single_crochet chain = chain increase = increase decrease = decrease double_crochet = double_crochet optional- for the shell border
